Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes an outdoor Rx program
Summary: Establishes an outdoor Rx program to benefit residents of the state, particularly veterans and individuals recovering from substance abuse or a physical or mental trauma by establishing outdoor environmental, ecological, agricultural, or other natural resource based therapy programs.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add Art 18 §§18.01 - 18.11, Pks & Rec L; add §99-ff, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to establishing an outdoor Rx program for outdoor environmental, ecological, agricultural, or other natural resource based therapy programs; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the outdoor Rx program fund
